tool_description: Generates event handler functions for DOM events, custom events, and component interactions with proper event delegation and optimization.

event_type.description: Type of event: click, change, submit, hover, focus, blur, keypress, scroll, resize, custom

handler_name.description: Name for the event handler function

parameters.description: Parameters the handler should accept beyond the event object

debounce_ms.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds (0 = no debouncing)

throttle_ms.description: Throttle delay in milliseconds (0 = no throttling)

error_messages: Invalid event type: Use one of [click, change, submit, hover, focus, blur, keypress, scroll, resize, custom].
Invalid handler name: Provide a valid JavaScript function name.
Cannot use both debounce and throttle: Choose either debounce_ms or throttle_ms, not both.
Invalid delay value: Debounce and throttle values must be non-negative integers.
Too many parameters: Maximum 10 additional parameters allowed for event handlers.
usage: Specify event_type and handler_name. Optionally add parameters, enable prevent_default/stop_propagation, and set debounce_ms or throttle_ms for performance optimization.

handler_type.description: Type of handler generated (basic, debounced, throttled)

binding_example.description: Example of how to bind the handler to a DOM element

cleanup_code.description: Cleanup code for removing event listeners if needed
